text: Ibliis Yallal koroositak yi Rabbow yoh warisey A seehadaytuy yol muxxussey konnabah kummaata kah itte yol kah muxxussem? Atu Qhiyaamah ayr√¥ fanah yoo wadirrossek, diggah kay samad ku gitak makkoyseyyooh amol keenik gaceyyooh ken bayseyyo, dago maray isi qibaadah keenik caglissey umaanek dacrisse akke waytek iyye
